channel.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm new to the forum so I'm not sure if this topic has been posted before.
What was the very first PC game you played?? Mine was Half Life! :freeman:

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: Awesomeness
item.description:
Doom was the first i ever played.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: lunertexcosmo
item.description:
I got one for you all. When was about 3-4-5-ish (don’t really remember), my grandfather received a game from my uncle (a very revolutionary one for the time I might add) and decided to show it to me without realizing what kind of game it was. Guess what it was?

1920×1080 64.8 KB

And nothing’s been the same since then…

Read full topic
item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: Jim_DiGriz
item.description:
Wow, do I feel old…:’(

The first (IBM or clone)PC game I remember playing was Zork. The first computer game I played was a game I wrote on a TRS-80 model III (48k, and had a single sided 120k 5.25 inch floppy drive). The first commercial computer game I played was either Telengard (VIC-20/C-64) or a graphical version of the old Mainframe Star Trek, but I don’t remember what it was called. I do remember that it was on cassette tape…

Read full topic
item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: SarahDank
item.description:
Fnork:

The very first I can not quite remember, but it might just have been Age of Empires 2. I got that on a CD along with a bunch of other games someone on my father’s job had downloaded, back before that was actually a crime.
Other games I remember from the same CD (or at least the same time, it’s hard to remember) are Rayman 2, Red Alert 2, Lego Racers 1 and 2 and Frogger 2.

Also, just pointing out the fact that I’m ignoring shitty “educational” “games” and weird Swedish games. Like the one I got for free from a clothing store chain.

Yeah, I did random educational ones like Madeline maths LOL

Read full topic
item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.description:
Doom, thief, and Rainbow six all at once… then the jumpstart series.

The very first I can not quite remember, but it might just have been Age of Empires 2. I got that on a CD along with a bunch of other games someone on my father’s job had downloaded, back before that was actually a crime.
Other games I remember from the same CD (or at least the same time, it’s hard to remember) are Rayman 2, Red Alert 2, Lego Racers 1 and 2 and Frogger 2.

Also, just pointing out the fact that I’m ignoring shitty “educational” “games” and weird Swedish games. Like the one I got for free from a clothing store chain.

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: fgsfds
item.description:

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: Tei
item.description:
i don’t even remember my first “PC Game”. All i know is that it was on a Commodore64. AfterBurner is the firste i can remember the name of. i also had some Sesame Street games and another series of educational games i played called “Sticky Bear”. Don’t Google it though.

…you WiLL get gay porn.

-Kawai Tei-

Read full topic
item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
Chip’s Challenge for me, too. Along with Rodent’s Revenge and Jezzball and Skifree, and the other Windows Entertainment Pack stuff.

Daedalus193:

Another one that I played after the Star Wars one was Sheep xD

I remember desperately wanting that game but I my PC was too bad to run it.

Read full topic
item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: Juan_Regular
item.description:
Prince Of Persia. Took me ages to beat that game.
First videogame though was Simon´s Quest. It´s a miracle I continued after that piece of shit.

Read full topic
item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: Brent
item.description:
I remember my first computer games being a lot of those shovelware PC games for kids you always see in Target and Staples and such. The first game I really remember playing a lot on PC was the PC port of Virtua Cop 2 (For some reason, it goes by the name Virtua Squad 2 on PC). I remember not having a gun to use, and being annoyed by having to use a mouse. Thus, I wasn’t very good at it, but I definitely played it a lot!

Read full topic
item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: DownloadFailed
item.description:
Insomniak:

Anyone remember TankWars?

Who doesn’t? I loved TankWars. First played it at a friend’s house. Can’t remember if I won any games, but if my memory serves me right, I got my ass romped.

Read full topic

item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: DownloadFailed
item.description:
The first game I actually remember playing I can’t actually remember the name of. It was MS DOS, IIRC, and it was somewhat similar to lode runner…

But the first PC game that I can REMEMBER playing (without a disc) was Hover.

The next game I remember playing with a disc was Zoo Tycoon with both expansions. CHRIST I loved that game. Recently got it again (love you, Internet) and it’s just like I remember it. Nostalgia leaking everywhere.

Read full topic
item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.source: What was your FIRST game on PC?

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: Lost_one
item.description:
Nintyuk:

Gorillas on my uncles PC, then A incredible machine then a whole slew of lucasarts adventure games, and C&C and Worms 2.

incredible Machine was a fun game too, I don’t count it as one of my firsts though since it was on a school machine at the time. But I beat every puzzle it had

item.title: What was your FIRST game on PC?
item.dc:creator: Vitriol
item.description:
First games I had came with the computer (16MHz 286 with 1MB RAM and a 20MB HDD).
Lemmings (never could get through Mayhem)
SimCity
Wolfenstein 3D
Wolfenstein 3D : Spear of Destiny
Scorched Earth
Prince of Persia

Read full topic
